title: fennic
author: fennic
created_time: October 06, 2022, 04:29:20 AMLast edit: October 06, 2022, 05:05:46 AM by fennic
content: I know guys it's silly question but I was wondering that wether how people got in to bot oinnand other cryptocurrency.My case is that in 2017 I heard in news that Bitcoin that is a digital cryptocurrency Crossed real gold for the First time. At that time it's price was above 1000 dollars. And that git me interested and I want to know more about crypto and now I am here and I making post 游때

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: fennic on October 06, 2022, 04:29:20 AMI know guys it's silly question but I was wondering that wether how people got in to bot oinnand other cryptocurrency.My case is that in 2017 I heard in news that Bitcoin that is a digital cryptocurrency Crossed real gold for the First time. At that time it's price was above 1000 dollars. And that git me interested and I want to know more about crypto and now I am here and I making post 游때i heard about bitcoin for the very first time when I driving my car back to my home from university and in the radio between songs, the presenter began to joke about bitcoin. Something like that:"will you believe? Someone made up their money, called it bitcoin. The funniest thing is that their price has exceeded that of the dollar. What an absurdity."Yep. That day bitcoin broke 1$. I did nothing ... I was too focused on parties and girls.I accepted the narrative of the presenter that it is actually absurd that someone even wants to have money invented by someone, most likely centralized. Next time I heard about bitcoin was in 2017 after it broke 10 000$ and thats when I bought it for the first time.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: I first heard about the bitcoin in the spring of 2016 when it cost $600. It was then that I was really interested in it, but I stopped at installing a wallet and then I never bought btc. Now I consider it one of my mistakes, because I didn't complete the work I started and there was a great opportunity to buy cheap bitcoin. Before 2016, I also heard about btc, but didn't attach any importance to this, not knowing anything about the technology and not understanding the possibilities that btc gives.

comments.author: Beefcake
comments.body: I don't remember exactly, but I heard about it fairly early on. I ignored it, and considered it to be a nonsense fad that would go away eventually. It didn't, and I eventually started paying more attention. My loss, same old "I wish I had been an early adopter" story. Good to keep an open mind I guess. I didn't, and I missed out on the chance of a lifetime.

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: Quote from: fennic on October 06, 2022, 04:29:20 AMMy case is that in 2017 I heard in news that Bitcoin that is a digital cryptocurrency Crossed real gold for the First time. At that time it's price was above 1000 dollars. And that git me interested and I want to know more about crypto and now I am here and I making post 游때if you buy at that price on January 2017, for sure you got rich at the end of the year, are you profit or regret it? I heard about bitcoin in January 2019, At that time the price is about $4,000 I bought a bit, then sent it to my own wallet until June 2019 I sold it for $11,000. I still regret why I sold it. If I am enough patient until November 2021, I will be happier. this is my story when known bitcoin for the first time.

comments.author: fuguebtc
comments.body: Quote from: Sarah Azhari on October 06, 2022, 07:29:20 AMQuote from: fennic on October 06, 2022, 04:29:20 AMMy case is that in 2017 I heard in news that Bitcoin that is a digital cryptocurrency Crossed real gold for the First time. At that time it's price was above 1000 dollars. And that git me interested and I want to know more about crypto and now I am here and I making post 游때if you buy at that price on January 2017, for sure you got rich at the end of the year, are you profit or regret it? I heard about bitcoin in January 2019, At that time the price is about $4,000 I bought a bit, then sent it to my own wallet until June 2019 I sold it for $11,000. I still regret why I sold it. If I am enough patient until November 2021, I will be happier. this is my story when known bitcoin for the first time.That's the interesting thing about bitcoin, no one can predict the future of bitcoin and the reward is always for the person who stays last. I think you don't need to regret selling bitcoin at that time because we are looking for profit here and you got pretty good return that bitcoin gives. Past mistakes will be lessons for us in the future, so there's no need to regret the past. If you don't want to regret again then now is your chance and all of us, buy bitcoin now and plan for the future to sell only when the set goal is reached. I got into the market very early myself but I also sold out of my bitcoins during bear season 2018 it was a really unfortunate time but it was a lesson for me when I got back into the market in 2020.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Remembering the first time about Bitcoin I don't remember it forgetting because it's been more than 5 years from now I have known bitcoin.Yes at first it seemed strange with this digital currency and I thought it wouldn't last long so I always ignored and never studied more deeply about Bitcoin because I focused on other work so it was my fault why didn't I just dive into it or buy when time was still cheap while I was still working and of course on every payday I would definitely buy it if I knew it was Bitcoin that would boom in the future, but I think at the beginning they met Bitcoin they wouldn't be too serious but over time they have understood how this Bitcoin asset really is valuable now and in the future.But I've never regretted it before for not buying more Bitcoin at a low price, but now I'm even more consistent to keep hoarding Bitcoin, it's never too late even though the price is high, whenever you buy it is the best price in your opinion.Investment in Bitcoin will have no expiration time, the longer you keep the higher the value of the asset.Someone celebrated ATH in 2013, while I was still clueless about Bitcoin. 游땍https://twitter.com/WatcherGuru/status/1573863837488537600

comments.author: Bobrox
comments.body: Little shy after seeing several reply here know with Bitcoin almost ten years ago and I am still new with Bitcoin because I know Bitcoin when price still under $1,000 around 2016. First time I know with bitcoin is not investment way but only used for digital currency I used for investing in many kind of hype project, after another digital currency like PayPal banned using for deposit fund in hype project I move to other currency is Bitcoin.I don't know about Bitcoin is the best way for investing but after price pump drastically give motivation to make Bitcoin as investment assets not only using for digital currency joining with hype project. Not in my minds with Bitcoin can reach until higher price when first time I know with bitcoin still have lower price under $1,000.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: You get to know about bitcoin around 2017, and you neglected it, thinking it won't last or won't go behold her price then. Now that you decide to know more about the financial freedom bitcoin gives, make use of the opportunity very well and invest in what you can afford to lose. I first heard about bitcoin through a friend, that introduce me to this forum, from there I got the necessary information and knowledge I needed to grow in crypto. Which am enjoying the benefits now

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: I remember exactly about hearing for BTC first time that was my free class time as my Friend was talking about BTC as how BTC is goin upside crazy and people are getting huge profits. Then he explained a little that BTC is a Digital Coin just that.. the main perpouse of chat was to describe how his Uncle is making good profit from it and thats it everything was about Profit. Then i learned about Blockchain and Bitcoin.

comments.body: Quote from: fennic on October 06, 2022, 04:29:20 AMI know guys it's silly question but I was wondering that wether how people got in to bot oinnand other cryptocurrency.My case is that in 2017 I heard in news that Bitcoin that is a digital cryptocurrency Crossed real gold for the First time. At that time it's price was above 1000 dollars. And that git me interested and I want to know more about crypto and now I am here and I making post 游때I heard of about Bitcoin because of those ponzi and hyips around on social media..Thats the first time hearing about bitcoin and my first impression that it is really some sort of easy moneythat you could really get from but thats not how reality works.I do have regrets on spending and wasting off lots of bitcoins back into those early years when i do first know it.I do spend and invest just like there's tomorrow and all of themwas just wasted because it turned out to be a scam.Well, lets just move on and proceed on what are the current things that we've been dealing with.

comments.author: 8rch7
comments.body: It all started from the internet world like google, every time i search google it always appears bitcoin, out of curiosity then i read and tried to learn about what bitcoin is, because at that time i did not understand and did not know how bitcoin works and how to invest bitcoin, because the more curious I tried to ask a friend on social media, after he explained at length about bitcoin, I still didn't understand because the more curious I finally took the initiative to meet my friend in person, after I studied for about a week I finally dared invest bitcoin in 2017.

comments.author: topman21
comments.body: Quote from: fennic on October 06, 2022, 04:29:20 AMI know guys it's silly question but I was wondering that wether how people got in to bot oinnand other cryptocurrency.My case is that in 2017 I heard in news that Bitcoin that is a digital cryptocurrency Crossed real gold for the First time. At that time it's price was above 1000 dollars. And that git me interested and I want to know more about crypto and now I am here and I making post 游때No friends such questions can never be absurd.A lot of people enter this bitcoin through a medium and they probably need a topic like this to express those mediums.But I entered this bitcoin in 2013. But me and a friend of mine were the first two to enter Bitcoin after hearing the news through some news media.From there we start doing analysis and step by step.This is how we first got into Bitcoin.

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: Let me see if I can still remember the first time for me to ever heard on Bitcoin. In my recollection, I think I must gotten into it via Facebook all because some of my online friends started to get of Bitcoin and so they started talking. Actually, BTC is not my first ever coin I hold but something like a scam TBC where everyday growth of the value is guaranteed. Then I started to get interested with bounties where back then many people really made good money...just like a newly opened goldmine.

comments.author: Pumared
comments.body: I did earn money with sites PTC (Pay to click) when i see BTC, i understood the idea and sign in here for make more money and learn. In short thats it!

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: For sure, most of the people who started to use or heard of Bitcoin are from the internet. Even mine, I have before some internet gigs or sideline to make a few bucks off the internet for giving some of my time of a day, and that's the time I was still a student. And that's the time I started to explore Bitcoin and it is very life-changing, a lot of lessons were learned by just using and learning Bitcoin.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: I first heard about bitcoin when I was an undergraduate student at the university. If my memory serves me well, people who sold it to us back then marketed it to us as a pyramid scheme. I concentrated on my schoolwork since I was too poor to be interested. A few of my classmates became wealthy and purchased vehicles, while some dropped out to focus on it. Actually, even after many years, both categories they are still in favor of bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies and prospering.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: I think I heard about bitcoin at news' websites a long time ago (during the initial years of btc) and was even told by someone close to me who also heard about it, but we didn't give any special attention to bitcoin on that time. It was only after some years that I was finally introduced to bitcoin by a stranger on the internet who taught me step by step how to setup a btc wallet and how to start earning btc for free.Now I regret a lot, because if I had been more curious regards bitcoin when I firstly discovered its existence I could have been an early adopter, having access to cheap bitcoin and profitable faucets where I could collect up to 5 BTC per claim!

comments.author: CageMabok
comments.body: Quote from: 8rch7 on October 06, 2022, 11:44:28 PMIt all started from the internet world like google, every time i search google it always appears bitcoin, out of curiosity then i read and tried to learn about what bitcoin is, because at that time i did not understand and did not know how bitcoin works and how to invest bitcoin, because the more curious I tried to ask a friend on social media, after he explained at length about bitcoin, I still didn't understand because the more curious I finally took the initiative to meet my friend in person, after I studied for about a week I finally dared invest bitcoin in 2017.A week is a very short time to learn about Bitcoin and how to invest in Bitcoin. Because my experience has also been asking and learning about Bitcoin through other people is a month and it is ideal for a beginner who doesn't know about Bitcoin and also how to invest in Bitcoin.So I am also curious about your very short study time, because it gives an assessment that you are a very extraordinary person in capturing every explanation about Bitcoin given by your friend. Don't you ask your friends again after that week?

comments.author: Crazy_Bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: m2017 on October 06, 2022, 06:59:52 AMI first heard about the bitcoin in the spring of 2016 when it cost $600. It was then that I was really interested in it, but I stopped at installing a wallet and then I never bought btc. Now I consider it one of my mistakes, because I didn't complete the work I started and there was a great opportunity to buy cheap bitcoin. Before 2016, I also heard about btc, but didn't attach any importance to this, not knowing anything about the technology and not understanding the possibilities that btc gives. Never regret the past. Because when people first learn about something, they don't have much focus on that thing. It's not just about you. You think about the present. Now the price of Bitcoin is very low. But will it be like this after 6 years? Of course not.And still there are many people who don't know about Bitcoin. 6 years from now when they learn about bitcoin they will regret learning about bitcoin 6 years ago just like you. So you should increase your confidence in Bitcoin, since you have been able to see Bitcoin predictions 6 years earlier than them.
